content.html: I just participated in my first "Swarm testing" session. The big idea: Get a group of people together, and try to break the app in a pre-release environment. We used different users, browsers, phones, and screen readers. We discussed and logged bugs. It was quite insightful!
content.value:
I just participated in my first "Swarm testing" session.

The big idea: Get a group of people together, and try to break the app in a pre-release environment.

We used different users, browsers, phones, and screen readers. We discussed and logged bugs. 

It was quite insightful!
